eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 02:25 PM ON OCT 02, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:50 PM OCT 06, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Safe Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. The Mesa Police Department is looking for 59 year old Ronald Mounts. Ronald is a white male, 6 feet 5 inches tall, 220 pounds with salt and pepper hair and brown eyes. Ronald was last seen wearing brown shorts, a gray shirt with holes in it, and carrying a tan shoulder bag. Ronald was last seen on foot on 09/29/2025 at 12: P.M. leaving his residence in the area of Gilbert Road and Baseline Road. Ronald suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become lost or easily confused. Please contact the Mesa Police Department at 480 644 2211 or call 911 with any information. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
